mdRecord.dcterms:description: Competition won by Klint, 1913. Construction begun 1921; initial dedication 1927. Interior and work on adjacent buildings continued until 1940 and completed by Klint's son Kaare Klint after his father's death in 1930. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grundtvig%27s_Church [work]
